mapper.sql: RID, EVENT_RID, ACCESS_ID, CLOSE_REASON, APP_LEVEL, APP_USERID, APP_TIME, APP_OPINION, APP_RESULT, ISSUE_STATE, SEND_TIME, CREATTIME, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE
RID, EVENT_RID, ACCESS_ID, CLOSE_REASON, APP_LEVEL, APP_USERID, APP_TIME, APP_OPINION, APP_RESULT, ISSUE_STATE, SEND_TIME, CREATTIME, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE
mapper.select: select swc.RID as RID, EVENT_RID, case when sse.IP is null or sse.IP='' then '无' ELSE sse.IP end as IP, case when sse.DOMAIN_NAME is null or sse.DOMAIN_NAME='' then '无' ELSE sse.DOMAIN_NAME end as DOMAIN_NAME, swc.ACCESS_ID as ACCESS_ID, APP_LEVEL, ssi.IDC_NAME as IDC_NAME, swc.LIABMAN as LIABMAN, swc.LIABDEPT as LIABDEPT, swc.LIABORG as LIABORG, case when WEB_CASE_RID is null or WEB_CASE_RID='' then '无' ELSE WEB_CASE_RID end as WEB_CASE_RID, case when WEBSITE_NAME is null or WEBSITE_NAME='' then '无' ELSE WEBSITE_NAME end as WEBSITE_NAME from SMMS_WEB_CLOSE_APP as swc left join smms_event_main as sse on swc.event_rid=sse.rid LEFT JOIN smms_idc_info as ssi on sse.access_id=ssi.idc_id LEFT JOIN smms_web_case as ssw on sse.web_case_rid=ssw.rid where swc.RID = #{RID}
select EVENT_RID from SMMS_WEB_CLOSE_APP where RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_WEB_CLOSE_APP set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: SELECT EVENT_RID as RID FROM smms_web_close_app WHERE RID=#{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_WEB_CLOSE_APP set APP_RESULT=#{APP_RESULT} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert:
insert into SMMS_WEB_CLOSE_APP (
EVENT_RID, ACCESS_ID, CLOSE_REASON, APP_LEVEL, APP_USERID, APP_TIME, APP_OPINION, APP_RESULT, ISSUE_STATE, SEND_TIME, CREATTIME, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE, RID) values (
#{EVENT_RID}, #{ACCESS_ID}, #{CLOSE_REASON}, #{APP_LEVEL}, #{APP_USERID}, #{APP_TIME}, #{APP_OPINION}, #{APP_RESULT}, #{ISSUE_STATE}, #{SEND_TIME}, #{CREATTIME}, #{LIABMAN}, #{LIABDEPT}, #{LIABORG}, #{RECORDSTATE}, #{RID})
